short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show a random pupil puzzle based on a currently open school seating plan.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Does it take you time to learn all the students in your class? This simple plugin randomly selects students from your currently visible seating plan and then asks you if you know the student's name. A feedback process ensures you see those you don't know more frequently until you've learnt the class.

No data is captured or sent anywhere - everything happens within your browser itself, based only on the seating plan which is currently open.
